enhanced_by.reason: Checking if the input collection or its elements are blank can help in setting up the test environment correctly.
Ensuring that the input collection does not contain numeric strings can help in setting up the test environment correctly.
Normalizing the whitespace in the output string can help in verifying the correctness of the joined string.
Verifying that the output string contains only ASCII characters can help in asserting the correctness of the joined string.
